overview_of_class: Ordinary differential equations; Sturm-Liouville theory, properties of special functions, solution methods including Laplace transforms. Fourier series: eigenvalue problems and expansions in orthogonal functions. Partial differential equations: classification, separation of variables, solution by series and transform methods
name: Methods of Applied Mathematics
title: MEAS ES_APPM 311-1-20 Methods of Applied Mathematics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Ordinary differential equations; Sturm-Liouville theory, properties of special functions, solution methods including Laplace transforms. Fourier series: eigenvalue problems and expansions in orthogonal functions. Partial differential equations: classification, separation of variables, solution by series and transform methods

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Required course notes: 311/411 Notes Olmstead and Volpert, "Differential Equations in Applied Math" The course packet is usually sold in the fall at Quartet 825 Clark St, Evanston IL 60201 for approx. $25.00.

subject: ES_APPM
